app.errorDetail: The application has encountered an error:
app.simplexSolved: Simplex {{ resultType }}: {{ time }}ms, {{ pivots }} pivots, size: {{ rows }} x {{ cols }}, cost: {{ cost }}
app.simplexErrorDetail:
Try using the WASM Float64 simplex solver with all recipes enabled, or check your disabled recipes to ensure a solution is feasible.

E.G. If one iron plate requires two gears, and one gear requires two iron plates, a solution for iron plates is not feasible.

settings.resetWarning: This will delete all saved FactorioLab settings in this browser, are you sure you want to continue?
settings.savedStatesTooltip: Click edit to name and save the current calculator state. Select a saved state from the dropdown to load it into the calculator.
settings.gameTooltip: Select which game calculator to use, or use the links in the title bar
settings.modSetTooltip: Select which version or set of mods in Factorio to use
settings.modVersionsTooltip: Versions of game / mods in this data set
settings.disabledRecipesTooltip: Click to modify which recipes are disabled. Disabled recipes will not be used in the solution.
settings.presetTooltip: Select a default preset of factory settings to use
settings.estimateBeaconPowerUsageTooltip: Enable to estimate power usage of beacons, based on an estimated average number of receivers per beacon
settings.averageBeaconReceiversTooltip: Average number of factories affected by each beacon; minimum value is 1
settings.proliferatorSelfSprayTooltip: Select the proliferator spray applied to proliferator itself
settings.defaultTransportBeltTooltip: Select the default belt to be used by all items
settings.defaultPipeTooltip: Select the default pipe to be used by all fluids
settings.defaultCargoWagonTooltip: Select the default cargo wagon to be used by all items
settings.defaultFluidWagonTooltip: Select the default fluid wagon to be used by all fluids
settings.chemicalFuelTooltip: Select the default chemical fuel to be used where applicable
settings.miningProductivityTooltip: Enter the current mining productivity bonus percent; default is 0%
settings.researchSpeedTooltip: Enter the current level of research speed bonus; this setting only affects research products
settings.inserterCapacityTooltip: Enter the current level of inserter capacity bonus; this setting only affects inserter estimates
settings.miningSpeedTooltip: Enter the current mining speed with bonus; Default is 100%
settings.displayRateTooltip: Set the unit of time to use in rates
settings.powerUnitTooltip: Set the unit of power to use in the power column
settings.simplexSolverTooltip: Select the simplex solver algorithm, or disable simplex to more easily modify settings when simplex is slow and causes lag
settings.simplexSolverDisabledInfo: Disabling simplex improves performance but usually results in a partial solution
settings.simplexSolverWasmFloat64Info: WebAssembly Float64 is less precise than Rationals, but runs significantly faster

list.inserterCountInfo: * Inserters are calculated using target/capacity settings and 0.18 experimental data from the wiki.
list.defaultRecipeInfo1: Click to set a recipe as the default for this item. If set, the default recipe is treated as the only way to produce this item.
list.defaultRecipeInfo2: The recipe must be enabled and must only produce this item.
list.defaultRecipeInfo3: Default was ignored due to a detected circular loop.
list.enabledRecipesInfo: Click recipes to enable or disable them. Disabled recipes will not be used in the solution.

matrix.recipeCostTooltip: Multiplies cost of recipes with a defined cost, usually mining
matrix.factoryCostTooltip: Multiplies cost of physical factories running recipes
matrix.inputCostTooltip: Cost of input items that are produced by no recipes
matrix.ignoredCostTooltip: Cost of items that have been explicitly ignored
matrix.tableauPrecisionNote: Note: This table uses the precision of the items column
